City Council
============

![](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/city-council-23-compressed-1.jpg)

**Back Row L-R – Scott Edmonson, City Manager; Marcus Amthor, Alderman; Michael Nelson, Alderman
Front Row L-R – Shawn Oliver, Alderman; Ken Jordan, Mayor; Bob Whitten, Mayor Pro-Tem; Oleta Behrens, Alderman**

****Council Member List | 2 Year Terms**
**Council meets second Tuesday of each month beginning at 6:00 p.m.****
